data.comment: The big names in today's match at Gamla Ullevi have now been confirmed.
The whistle has gone to start the match.
In the minute 2, Goteborg to take a throw-in in Sirius territory.
Throw-in for Goteborg in their own half.
In Gothenburg a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 4, Robin Soder (Goteborg) gets in a shot â€“ but hits the bar! Ohhhh so close.
Bojan Pandzic signals a Sirius throw-in in Goteborg's half.
Goteborg awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 6, Bojan Pandzic awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick for Sirius in their own half.
Bojan Pandzic awards Goteborg a goal kick.
In the minute 8, Sargon Abraham for Goteborg gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Sirius goal kick.
Bojan Pandzic signals a free kick to Goteborg in their own half.
In the minute 10, In Gothenburg Sirius attack through Mohammed Saeid. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Goteborg at Gamla Ullevi.
Free kick in a good position for Goteborg!
In the minute 11, Goal! Mattias Bjarsmyr heads Goteborg into a 1-0 lead.
That's a fine assist from Tobias Sana.
Ball safe as Sirius is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 16, Throw-in for Sirius at Gamla Ullevi.
Bojan Pandzic signals a free kick to Sirius.
Pontus Wernbloom (Goteborg) has been given a yellow card and will be suspended from the next match.
In the minute 19, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Goteborg needs to be cautious. Sirius have an attacking throw-in.
Free kick Sirius.
In the minute 22, Free kick for Goteborg in their own half.
Free kick for Sirius in the half of Goteborg.
Goteborg awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 26, Throw-in Goteborg.
Bojan Pandzic signals a free kick to Goteborg in their own half.
Goteborg have a goal kick.
In the minute 34, In Gothenburg a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Goteborg have been awarded a corner by Bojan Pandzic.
Can Sirius get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Goteborg's half?
In the minute 36, Throw-in high up the field for Sirius in Gothenburg.
Sirius have a dangerous throw-in.
Goteborg advance rapidly upfield but Bojan Pandzic blows for offside.
In the minute 39, Throw-in for Goteborg in the half of Sirius.
Can Goteborg capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Sirius's half?
Goteborg push forward at Gamla Ullevi and Sebastian Eriksson gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the Sirius defence.
In the minute 41, Free kick for Goteborg in their own half.
Throw-in for Sirius close to the penalty box.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Gothenburg.
In the minute 42, Sirius awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Bojan Pandzic signals a throw-in for Sirius, close to Goteborg's area.
Throw-in Goteborg.
In the minute 45, Joakim Persson of Sirius smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
The first-half has come to a close in Gothenburg.
The second-half has started.
In the minute 46, Bojan Pandzic signals a Sirius throw-in in Goteborg's half.
Goteborg needs to be cautious. Sirius have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 48, Goteborg are caught offside.
The away team replace Karl Larson with Niklas Busch Thor.
Ball safe as Sirius is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Goteborg awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 50, Goteborg awarded a free kick in their own half.
Bojan Pandzic awards Sirius a goal kick.
Throw-in for Sirius close to the penalty box.
In the minute 52, Bojan Pandzic awards the home team a throw-in.
Sirius to take a throw-in in Goteborg territory.
Corner awarded to Goteborg.
In the minute 53, Can Goteborg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sirius's half?
Corner awarded to Sirius.
Sirius have been awarded a corner by Bojan Pandzic.
In the minute 55, Bojan Pandzic signals a free kick to Goteborg in their own half.
Goteborg are coming forward and Tobias Sana gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Gothenburg.
In the minute 56, Throw-in for Sirius in their own half.
Bojan Pandzic signals a free kick to Goteborg in their own half.
Sirius's Hjalmar Ekdal has been booked in Gothenburg.
In the minute 58, Goal kick for Sirius at Gamla Ullevi.
Ball goes out of play for a Goteborg goal kick.
Free kick for Goteborg in their own half.
In the minute 63, Joakim Persson (Sirius) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Simon Gefvert is replacing Laorent Shabani for the away team.
Alexander Farnerud is replacing Emil Holm for Goteborg at Gamla Ullevi.
In the minute 65, Throw-in for Sirius at Gamla Ullevi.
Sirius awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Sirius in the half of Goteborg.
In the minute 66, Bojan Pandzic signals a free kick to Goteborg.
Free kick Sirius.
Alexander Farnerud for Goteborg has been booked by Bojan Pandzic and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 68, Sirius have been awarded a corner by Bojan Pandzic.
Sirius drive upfield at Gamla Ullevi and Jamie Roche hits the bar with a header.
Goteborg have a goal kick.
In the minute 69, Goteborg awarded a free kick in their own half.
Bojan Pandzic signals a free kick to Goteborg in their own half.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Sirius close to the penalty box.
In the minute 72, Ball safe as Sirius is awarded a throw-in in their half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Sirius have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 73, Roland Nilsson (Goteborg) is making a second substitution, with August Erlingmark replacing Robin Soder.
Roland Nilsson is making the team's third substitution at Gamla Ullevi with Kristopher Da Graca replacing Jesper Tolinsson.
Throw-in high up the field for Sirius in Gothenburg.
In the minute 74, Throw-in for Goteborg in their own half.
Can Sirius capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Goteborg's half?
Goteborg's Tobias Sana gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 79, Bojan Pandzic awards Sirius a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Goteborg.
Goal! Mattias Bjarsmyr extends Goteborg's lead to 2-0.
In the minute 80, Sargon Abraham with an assist there.
Goteborg to take a throw-in in Sirius territory.
Samuel Wikman is on a sub for Mohammed Saeid for Sirius.
In the minute 83, Bojan Pandzic awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in Goteborg.
Can Goteborg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sirius's half?
In the minute 86, Throw-in for Goteborg at Gamla Ullevi.
Throw-in for Sirius in their own half.
In the minute 87, Goal kick for Goteborg at Gamla Ullevi.
Sirius make their fourth substitution with Erik Langwagen replacing Johan Karlsson.
In the minute 88, Bojan Pandzic signals a Goteborg throw-in in Sirius's half.
The home team have replaced Sargon Abraham with Isak Dahlqvist. This is the fourth substitution made today by Roland Nilsson.
Rasmus Wikstrom is on a sub for Sebastian Eriksson for Goteborg.
Throw-in for Sirius in the half of Goteborg.
Bojan Pandzic signals a throw-in for Sirius, close to Goteborg's area.
Sirius's Jamie Roche breaks free at Gamla Ullevi. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goteborg have a goal kick.
Sirius awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Bojan Pandzic will wait an extra 3 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Goteborg in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Gothenburg.
Free kick for Goteborg in the half of Sirius.
Bojan Pandzic blows to end the match. The final score is 2-0.
